metadata.title: CVE-2023-33568 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in Dolibarr 16 before 16.0.5 allows unauthenticated attackers toperform a database dump and access a company's entire customer file,prospects, suppliers, and employee information if a contact file exists.

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
